Name: Charlie Brown
Title: Protagonist
Bio: The lovable loser and main character of Peanuts. Known for his round head, zigzag-patterned shirt, and perpetual optimism despite constant failure. Manages a terrible baseball team and is hopelessly in love with the Little Red-Haired Girl.

Name: Snoopy
Title: Charlie Brown's pet beagle
Bio: The imaginative and independent beagle who lives in a doghouse and often pretends to be a World War I Flying Ace, Joe Cool, or a famous author. Best friends with Woodstock and has a rich fantasy life.

Name: Lucy van Pelt
Title: Antagonist/Fussbudget
Bio: The bossy, crabby, and opinionated girl who runs a psychiatric booth for 5 cents. Known for pulling away the football from Charlie Brown and having an unrequited crush on Schroeder.

Name: Linus van Pelt
Title: Philosopher
Bio: Lucy's younger brother and Charlie Brown's best friend. An intellectual and philosophical child who carries his security blanket everywhere and believes in the Great Pumpkin.

Name: Woodstock
Title: Snoopy's sidekick
Bio: Snoopy's tiny yellow bird companion who communicates in chirps and scratches. Often participates in Snoopy's adventures and fantasies, including serving as his Flying Ace mechanic.

Name: Peppermint Patty
Title: Tomboy athlete
Bio: The athletic, confident tomboy who excels at sports but struggles academically. Calls Charlie Brown "Chuck" and often falls asleep in class. Has an unrequited crush on Charlie Brown.

Name: Marcie
Title: Intelligent sidekick
Bio: Peppermint Patty's best friend and intellectual opposite. Extremely polite, studious, and calls Peppermint Patty "sir." Wears glasses and provides a calming contrast to Patty's energetic nature.

Name: Sally Brown
Title: Innocent sibling
Bio: Charlie Brown's younger sister who is naive, lazy about homework, and often misunderstands things. Has a crush on Linus whom she calls her "Sweet Babboo" and is known for her humorous philosophical musings.

Name: Schroeder
Title: Musical prodigy
Bio: The piano virtuoso obsessed with Beethoven and classical music. Often annoyed by Lucy's constant attempts to get his attention while he practices on his toy piano.

Name: Pig-Pen
Title: Dirty kid
Bio: The perpetually filthy boy who walks around in a cloud of dust. Despite his appearance, he's proud of his dirtiness and has a philosophical attitude about cleanliness.
